name: ReferralOrCounselingForAlcoholConsumption
title: Referral or Counseling for Alcohol Consumption
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent the type of interventions relevant to alcohol use.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure or Intervention.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with indicating the type of education provided, referral to community service or rehabilitation center for alcohol use.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
